item.title: Apple TV getting a 50% discount is my pick for the best Black Friday streaming deal in Australia so far
item.description: Stream Pluribus, Ted Lasso, Severance, Slow Horses, The Morning Show and much more top-rated TV shows thanks to this Black Friday streaming deal– six months of Apple TV for just AU$7.99 a month.
